backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing access-controlled user profiles and multi-chat storage with create, fetch, and restricted chatbot reply functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light and dark themes and applying global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, multi-chat flow, message sending, autosave, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Sign‑in/sign‑out button integrating Internet Identity with login state handling.
frontend/src/components/ChatComposer.tsx: Message composer with textarea and send button supporting Enter-to-send behavior.
frontend/src/components/ChatHistoryPanel: Sidebar listing chats with selection, creation, and deletion including a confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessage.tsx: Renders a chat message with user or assistant avatar styling and displays message content with role‑based colors.
frontend/src/components/DeveloperSafetyN: Provides a collapsible developer warning highlighting API key exposure risks and best security practices.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a dialog for entering and saving a user name using backend mutation with error handling.
frontend/src/components/SafetyUsage.tsx: Displays chatbot safety guidelines, content restrictions, and acceptable usage information.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatAutosave.ts: Handles restoring and persisting chat messages, saving to backend when authenticated or local storage when anonymous.
frontend/src/hooks/useChats.ts: Provides hooks for listing chats, fetching a chat, creating chats, deleting chats, and adding messages via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current authenticated user's profile with proper loading state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and exposes the authenticated identity to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a mutation for sending a prompt to the backend chatbot and invalidates message queries after replies.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a full light/dark OKLCH color theme using CSS variables, plus some global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/types/chat.ts: Declares the UIMessage interface for chat messages with id, role, content, and timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/chatLocalStore.ts: Provides localStorage helpers for saving, loading, selecting, and clearing chat conversations.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Implements utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, OKLCH color variables, container settings, and extended animations and components.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, safety notes, existing features, and known issues for the build.
